ygData.subject: Re: Gemcutter
ygData.msgSnippet: The dust comes off of the Ice Giant Priest from within Permafrost.  From what I understand, it s a rare drop also.  A friend gave me the dust that she looted,
ygData.messageBody:
The dust comes off of the Ice Giant Priest from within
Permafrost. From what I understand, it's a rare drop
also. A friend gave me the dust that she looted, and
I created a gem chopper and gave it to her. Hopefully
it will be implemented completely by the next patch.

Gazamel Prime
Solusek Ro


--- Garett <osmosis@...> wrote:
> Did he get the dust from an ice giant? I spend
> several hours with a goup
> outside of permafrost killing the ice giants that
> guard the cave, and no-one
> in our group looted any diamond dust.
>
> Cogg - RZ
